translation.en: Things will never be the same without him, huh?
translation.zh: ‎没有他 一切都会不一样吧？

translation.en: No.
Our people, uh...
I know they don't get along that good.
They'll be okay.
Uh, Frankie. I know you don't like me because the commission passed you over.
translation.zh:
‎弗兰克 我知道你不喜欢我
‎因为委员会对你未加考虑

translation.en: You being my brother's underboss,
you think you should have been the next in line. I understand that.
translation.zh:
‎所以你觉得你该成为
‎下一任老大 对此我很理解

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I like you, Aldo.
translation.zh: ‎事实上 我欣赏你 奥尔多

translation.en: You're just not qualified to be a boss.
You're a bean counter.
You belong on Wall Street, not with us.
translation.zh:
‎你该去华尔街混
‎而不是和我们混

translation.en: What are you trying to say?
Everything's money with you, Aldo.
translation.zh:
‎奥尔多 对你来说
‎金钱就是一切 ‎你并不尊重我们的事情

translation.en: You got no respect for our thing.
You got no soul.
That's why your brother, Sally Boy, rest in peace,
translation.zh:
‎所以你哥哥萨利博伊
‎才会寿终正寝

translation.en: never gave you more than his taxes to do every year.
translation.zh:
‎每年也就是让你
‎处理他的税务而已

translation.en: Yeah? Well, I'm the boss now.
And you better make sure your people keep in line.
Don't worry about my people.
But you better worry about yours.
[mutters] Yeah.
Hey, boss.
Jimmy, what do you hear, what do you say?
translation.zh:
‎吉米 你听到什么
‎说了什么？

translation.en: Couple of those FBI guys were in here.
translation.zh:
‎有几个联邦调查局的人
‎来过这里

translation.en: They left a card.
- Oh, yeah? - Golf buddies of yours?
They're trying to convince me my life's in danger.
[Jimmy] You?
You're the only guy I know whose life isn't in danger.
translation.zh:
‎你是我认识的
‎唯一一个命很大的人

translation.en: And everybody I know, everybody loves Frankie the Fixer.
translation.zh:
‎大家都知道
‎大家都爱调停师弗兰克

translation.en: Eh, tell me about it.
I'm gonna give you the cocksucker,
but I got some demands.
For starters, I don't want to relocate in the US.
translation.zh:
‎首先 我不想在
‎美国内进行人事调动

translation.en: It ain't safe around here no more.
Then what are you thinking? Sun bed in the Bahamas?
translation.zh:
‎你在想什么？
‎巴哈马群岛的日光浴？

translation.en: Nah.
Melanoma's for the old-school wiseguys.
translation.zh: ‎老派特警才会想去患皮肤癌

translation.en: I'm thinking Lilyhammer.
Lily what?
[woman] I think it's in Sweden. Close enough.
Why the fuck would you want to go there?
Didn't you see the Olympics in '94?
It was beautiful.
Clean air, fresh white snow, gorgeous broads,
translation.zh:
‎空气干净
‎白雪清新 女人美艳

translation.en: and best of all, nobody but nobody's gonna be looking for me there.
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是 那里没人会找我

translation.en: Listen, you give us Aldo Delucci,
translation.zh: ‎听着 你给我们奥尔多德鲁奇

translation.en: and we'll send you to the goddamn North Pole.
You got a deal.
[woman on radio] Just minutes ago, the district attorney's prime witness,
translation.zh:
‎几分钟前
‎地方检察官的主要证人

translation.en: former underboss Frank "The Fixer" Tagliano,
translation.zh:
‎前第二把手
‎“调停师”弗兰克塔格利亚诺

translation.en: gave a shattering testimony against his boss, Aldo Delucci.
translation.zh:
‎给出了对其上级奥尔多德鲁奇
‎极为不利的证词 令人震惊

translation.en: Inside sources say Tagliano is the last person
translation.zh:
‎内部消息称
‎塔格利亚诺被认为是

translation.en: anyone would have expected to testify.
[man] Now, sports with Mike Mitchell...
translation.zh:
‎现在请麦克米歇尔
‎播报体育新闻…

translation.en: Look, here's the file to your new identity,
and the address to your new house.
We had to give you a backstory with a Norwegian father.
translation.zh:
‎我们得把你的身份背景
‎设定成你有一位挪威父亲

translation.en: From now on, you're Giovanni Henriksen.
translation.zh:
‎从现在起
‎你是乔瓦尼亨里克森

translation.en: You're a restaurant owner with no criminal record.
translation.zh: ‎你经营餐馆 无犯罪前科

translation.en: [stammers] Hangrinsen?
You couldn't find a more complicated name?
If you get into any, and I mean any trouble with the police,
translation.zh: ‎你若惹了任何麻烦被警察找上

translation.en: you are on your own.
Don't worry about a thing.
I'm a brand-new guy over here.
Yeah, right.
[woman speaking Norwegian on headphones] Hello.
How are you?
I am fine.
How about you?
Hi.
My name is Kari.
What is your name?
Chapter Nine: Shopping.
Sorry, we are sold out of bread.
That's okay... [voice fades]
[man 1] Not so good-looking? [man 2] She was at least 30 years old.
translation.zh:
‎-不是很漂亮？
‎-她至少有三十岁

translation.en: - Could you please turn it down? - [man 1] Like this?
- [older man] Please, turn it off. - [man 1] Jerk!
- Hey. - Give me my cap back.   Give me my cap back.
[in English] Do I have your attention? Just nod.
translation.zh: ‎能请你注意一下吗？点头就行

translation.en: Yeah. This is what happens next:
You're gonna go out there, you're gonna give the man his hat back,
translation.zh: ‎你出去 把帽子还给那男人

translation.en: and you're gonna shut that shit off. Yes?
translation.zh:
‎-再把那破玩意关掉 行？
‎-行

translation.en: - Yes. - Here's your fucking hanky.
Go do the right thing.
- [in Norwegian] Turn the music off. - [music stops]
Sorry.
- Okay? - Okay
- [man 2 mutters insult] - Shut up.
So, straight to the asylum reception center, I take it?
[in English] Excuse me?
[in Norwegian] Oh, you don't speak Norwegian?
[in English] Uh... Just a little bit.
[in Norwegian] I just thought you looked a little Arab.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得你看着有点像阿拉伯人

translation.en: [in English] You look a little Arabish in the face.
Well, I'm an American.
translation.zh: ‎我是美国人 ‎美国人？你来莉莉海默干吗？

translation.en: [in Norwegian] An American? What the hell are you doing in Lillehammer?
[in English] Tell you the truth, I fell in love with your Olympics.
translation.zh:
‎说实话 我爱上了
‎你们那一届奥林匹克

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Ah, those were the days. I wasn't sober until February, 1995.
translation.zh:
‎那真是段好时光！
‎我喝到1995年2月才酒醒

translation.en: [in English] I wasn't sober until one year after.
translation.zh: ‎我在之后的一年里都没酒醒过

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Okay.
[in English] Here we are.
- That place? - Yep.
[in Norwegian] So, that'll be 273 kroner.
[in English] Are you sure that's the house?
translation.zh:
‎-你确定是那房子？
‎-是的 先生

translation.en: Yes, sir. [in Norwegian] This is it.
translation.zh:
‎-你确定是那房子？
‎-是的 先生 ‎就是这里

translation.en: [in English] Here you go. Keep the change, all right?
[in Norwegian] Shit, thanks a lot.
[in English] Welcome to Lillehammer.
This one's for you, Lily.
[man speaking Norwegian on TV] What makes a person seek solitude and a strange religion?
translation.zh:
‎是什么让人想要隐居
‎而且信奉奇怪的信仰？

translation.en: The answer can be found in...
- [alarm beeping loudly] - [man speaking Norwegian on radio]
translation.zh:
‎…在莉莉海默地区
‎又一次出现了不速之客

translation.en: ...and again there has been an unwanted guest in the Lillehammer area.
translation.zh:
‎…在莉莉海默地区
‎又一次出现了不速之客 ‎有人昨日目击到这匹狼…

translation.en: The wolf was sighted yesterday...
[in Norwegian] How are you?
How are you?
[in English] What the fuck...
- [in Norwegian] There it is! - [in English] Excuse me?
[in Norwegian] It is my sheep head. It must have fallen out of the bag.
translation.zh:
‎那是我的羊头
‎肯定是从袋子里掉出来的

translation.en: [in English] I'm sorry, I don't understand.
Oh, the sheep head, it's my dinner.
- Oh. You're gonna eat this? - Oh, yeah. It's very good. - Yum! Yum! - [Frank chuckling]
translation.zh:
‎-你要吃这个？
‎-是啊 很好吃的

translation.en: Well, for a minute there,
I thought I was going to have to give Johnny Fontane a movie part.
translation.zh:
‎我以为这是什么
‎杀鸡儆猴的手段

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] Okay. You must be the new neighbor.
- Laila Hovland. - Hi. Giovanni Hankrensen.
translation.zh: ‎莱拉霍夫兰 ‎嗨 我是乔瓦尼亨科里森

translation.en: Hankrensen? Is that Indian or...
[stammering] No, it's Henriksen.
My father was Norwegian.
[in Norwegian] He was Norwegian.
translation.zh: ‎我父亲是挪威人 ‎他是挪威人

translation.en: So you understand Norwegian?
- [Laila laughing] - [in English] Call me Johnny.
translation.zh:
‎所以你懂挪威语吗？ ‎-叫我强尼就行
‎-强尼

translation.en: - Johnny. - Oh, you're in the postal service, huh?
translation.zh:
‎-叫我强尼就行
‎-强尼 ‎你从事邮电业工作？

translation.en: [in English] Oh, no. I'm, um, the... lensmann.
I'm chief of police.
[in Norwegian] So, you'll sleep safely here.
- Oh... - [in English] See you around! [in Norwegian] See you, Johnny!
Okay...
What the fuck?
Fuckin' amateurs.
How are you doing?
- Giovanni Henriksen? - Yes.
So...
You lived in New York all your life?
That's right.
♪ Start spreading the news ♪
[chuckling] I was there once, you know. The Big Apple.
- That's good. - Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎很棒 ‎你有一些经营餐馆的背景？

translation.en: And you have some background from the restaurant business?
Yeah.
[in Norwegian] There are not many jobs available now.
There's not very much here... A delivery job at Dolly Dimple's.
translation.zh:
‎这里没有很多…
‎披萨店送外卖的工作

translation.en: [in English] Pizza delivery.
I had a very successful bar in New York, you know.
translation.zh:
‎我在纽约曾经营一家
‎很成功的酒吧

translation.en: So I know all about it.
I just need you to make a few moves so I can get a local license, that's all.
translation.zh:
‎我只是需要你动些手脚 ‎好让我拿到
‎这里的执照 就这样

translation.en: [in Norwegian] We need to have a reality check.
[in English] We have to have some reality check here, you know?
translation.zh:
‎我们在这里得做一些
‎实际的检查 知道吧？

translation.en: To start a bar is a very complicated process.
translation.zh:
‎开酒吧是一个
‎非常复杂的过程

translation.en: Oh, complications. That's what you call it here?
translation.zh: ‎复杂啊 这里都是这么叫的？

translation.en: Same thing where I come from.
I brought a little something for that purpose.
translation.zh: ‎我带了些东西 ‎就是为了那个

translation.en: Take care of whoever you gotta take care of.
[in Norwegian] Excuse me, but are you attempting to bribe a public official?
translation.zh:
‎抱歉 但你这是在
‎行贿公务人员吗？

translation.en: [in English] No. It's just so everybody can wet their beak a little bit.
- Do you want me to call the police? - What?
Should I pick up the phone and call the police?
Easy, take it easy.
All right, maybe you do things differently here.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 这里的行事方式
‎或许不一样

translation.en: - Yeah. - I apologize.
Okay.
Maybe we should put this on the account for cultural differences?
translation.zh:
‎或许我们该把这个
‎归因于文化差异？

translation.en: Cultural differences.
[in Norwegian] I think we'll start by enrolling you on a job-seeker course.
translation.zh:
‎我们要先让你
‎去参加找工作的课程

translation.en: Starts Friday.
You turn up there with a slightly more humble attitude, and we'll start afresh.
translation.zh:
‎你来上课时的态度
‎要稍微谦逊一点 ‎我们重头开始

translation.en: - [in English] Blank sheets, okay? - Okay, okay, blank sheets.
translation.zh: ‎从零开始 行吗？ ‎好吧 从零开始

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Take this one with you and read it.
See you on Friday.
- [in English] Thank you. - [in Norwegian] Bye.
[woman speaking Norwegian on headphones] Hello.
How are you?
Fine. And you?
I have new mittens.
How about you?
[in English] What the fuck?
Little lamb,
what are you doing out here by yourself?
All right. Take it easy.
Take it easy.
- [sheep bleating] - Where you going? Come here!
[man speaking Norwegian on TV] But in languages,
not only linguistics and research are important.
translation.zh: ‎不是只有语言学和研究重要 ‎你觉得是狼杀了我的羊吗？

translation.en: Do you think the wolf killed my sheep?
No, Jonas, don't think like that.
translation.zh: ‎不是的 乔纳斯 别那么想

translation.en: Everything will be fine.
I couldn't see any footprints of predators.
Dad?
Do you know anyone who drives an electric car?
Hi. Do you need any help?
Uh... Come, come.
[whispers] Put that away.
[in English] I found her on the road and I'm looking for the owner.
translation.zh:
‎我在路上找到它
‎我在找它的主人

translation.en: [Sigrid in Norwegian] It is an escaped sheep.
- Hi, I'm Sigrid. - [in English] Oh, hi.
translation.zh:
‎嗨 我是西格丽德 ‎-嗨
‎-我们在火车上没打招呼

translation.en: We never said hello on the train.
Yeah, yeah. Giovanni. Call me Johnny.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我是乔瓦尼
‎叫我强尼就好

translation.en: [Sigrid in Norwegian] Now you are happy, Jonas.
translation.zh: ‎乔纳斯 你现在开心了吧

translation.en: You...
Thanks a lot for finding her.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你找到它 ‎我的荣幸 纯属运气

translation.en: [in English] My pleasure. I got lucky.
- That's a nice kid you got there. - Yeah.
Father around? I'd like to meet him.
Uh... No, he's not living here.
Well, small town. Maybe we'll run into each other again, you know?
translation.zh: ‎这镇很小 我们会再见面的

translation.en: - Yeah. - Have a little coffee.
Okay. Thank you.
[in Norwegian] Hello. Nice that so many could come.
translation.zh: ‎你们好 有这么多人来 真好

translation.en: Eight people. Very good.
Today we are going to have a look at some forms.
You are disturbing us.
What Giovanni is doing here,
is breaking the first rule of the workplace,
translation.zh: ‎违法了工作场合的第一准则 ‎也就是守时

translation.en: namely, being punctual.
So, I see there are some regulars here.
That's always nice. Hi, Maria.
translation.zh: ‎这总是好的 嗨 玛利亚

translation.en: Those among you who were at the motivation seminar
translation.zh:
‎那些去年参加过
‎在我的小屋开展的

translation.en: held at my cabin last year know that I am a fishing enthusiast.
translation.zh: ‎研讨班的人 ‎知道我是一个钓鱼喜好者

translation.en: And what I usually say is that getting a job is like fishing.
translation.zh:
‎我常常说的话就是
‎找工作就像钓鱼

translation.en: You have to put the line out to catch something.
It's time for you to meet a friend of mine. Arne.
translation.zh:
‎是时候向你们介绍
‎我的朋友阿恩

translation.en: Today, Arne is your employer, and you are going to a job interview.
translation.zh:
‎今天 阿恩是你们的雇主
‎你们要来进行工作面试

translation.en: - [Arne] Am I... Sorry. - [Jan] Don't disturb me.
Um... Any volunteers?
Does anyone want to... Giovanni?
[in English] Come on, let's give it a shot. Yes, please.
translation.zh:
‎快点 试试看 快！
‎是的 请吧

translation.en: Thank you.
[in Norwegian] Hi, Giovanni.
Why, exactly should we choose you?
[in English] Do I talk to you or talk to the dummy?
translation.zh:
‎我是对你说
‎还是对这哑巴说？

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Talk to Arne.
Hi, Giovanni. Uh... What are your strong qualities?
[in English] My strong qualities? Uh...
I'd say observation's one of my finer qualities.
Observing you, I'd say you look a little stiff.
translation.zh: ‎观察你 我觉得你看着有点呆

translation.en: [in Norwegian] You can't have a little fun.
Let's take a little break.
Giovanni, could I have two minutes?
[in English] Two minutes, please.
[in Norwegian] I'm going to transfer you over to a course called Fresh Start.
[in English] What's that?
It's a six-month daily course
translation.zh: ‎是一个为期六个月的每日课程

translation.en: for immigrants that struggle to adapt to Norwegian society.
translation.zh:
‎专为不知如何融入
‎挪威社会的移民者准备

translation.en: Six months? You gotta be joking.
[in Norwegian] I never joke when it comes to integration, Giovanni. You need this.
translation.zh:
‎涉及协调问题我从不说笑
‎乔凡尼 你需要上这课

translation.en: [in English] Wait a minute. Are you telling me
translation.zh: ‎等等 ‎你是在说 我得花半年时间

translation.en: I gotta spend half a year learning how to be a fucking immigrant?
translation.zh: ‎你是在说 我得花半年时间 ‎去学如何成为移民者？

translation.en: [in Norwegian] You would perhaps rather have me call the police.
[in English] Do you want me to call the police, then? And tell them about the bribe?
translation.zh:
‎那你想让我叫警察吗？
‎告诉他们行贿的事？

translation.en: - Okay. [sighs] - Okay.
Hey, mister. Mister.
Do you want to come for a beer? [in Norwegian] A Friday beer?
[in English] With us?
Uh... No, thanks. I gotta pass. It's a big TV night.
translation.zh:
‎不了 谢谢 我就不去了
‎今晚有很多电视节目

translation.en: Sure, okay.
On second thought, one drink. What the hell.
translation.zh: ‎我改变主意了 喝一杯 ‎为何不

translation.en: - Sure. Okay. - Yeah.
[in Norwegian] I get 340 kroners a day from NAV to manage.
translation.zh:
‎我每天从挪威劳福社
‎领340块来花

translation.en: How are you going to manage on that?
[in English] I only get 340 kroners per day from NAV.
translation.zh: ‎每天从劳福社只领到340块 ‎能用来交你的电话费和电费

translation.en: [in Norwegian] That is going to cover your cell phone and electricity bills
translation.zh: ‎能用来交你的电话费和电费

translation.en: - and food expenses. - You don't have any food expenses.
translation.zh:
‎-还有伙食费
‎-你没有任何伙食费

translation.en: You know you eat at home every day.
[stammers] I am talking about the principle.
How can you manage on 340 kroner a day?
translation.zh: ‎我说的是原则问题 ‎340块一天能怎么花？

translation.en: I am talking about the system.
We haven't ordered anything.
From that table.
[Roar] You sit here and drink beer every day. [Torgeir] The system is fucked.
translation.zh:
‎-你每天坐在这里喝啤酒
‎-体系太糟了

translation.en: Shut up. Let's throw some darts.
I am not so good at darts.
[in English] Do you want to come play, um...
[in Norwegian] What is it called?
- [in English] Dart? - No. No, thanks.
translation.zh: ‎飞镖？ ‎不 谢了 我来守着桌子

translation.en: - I'll stay here and hold the table. - Okay.
translation.zh: ‎不 谢了 我来守着桌子 ‎好吧 等我 我去玩一局

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Wait for me. I'll take the first round.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 等我 我去玩一局

translation.en: - [in English] Hi. - Please.
[in Norwegian] Thank you for the champagne.
[in English] Oh, my pleasure.
[in Norwegian] Are you together with friends?
- You don't take... - It's my turn now.
[in English] Friends...
More like business associates.
Okay. So what kind of business is that?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 是什么类型的生意？

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Torgeir gets money from NAV.
- It's that obvious? - Yeah.
I'm not gonna be at NAV too long. I'm just getting some information.
translation.zh:
‎我不会在劳福社待很久 ‎只是想掌握一些信息
‎我其实想开一家夜总会

translation.en: I'm opening a nightclub, actually.
translation.zh:
‎只是想掌握一些信息
‎我其实想开一家夜总会

translation.en: - Oh, that's nice. - Yeah.
And you? What do you do?
I'm a teacher, you know... [in Norwegian] a Norwegian teacher.
[in English] I used to work in Oslo, but now I hope to get a job here.
translation.zh: ‎我曾在奥斯陆工作 ‎但现在希望能在这里工作

translation.en: But it's not so easy in this... [in Norwegian] county. So, we'll see.
translation.zh:
‎但在这个县找工作不容易
‎所以走着看吧

translation.en: Well, there's a lot of new foreigners in town, so maybe they'll be hiring soon.
translation.zh: ‎镇上有很多新来的外国人 ‎或许很快能提供就业机会

translation.en: To teachers.
[in Norwegian] Yeah. Cheers.
[in Norwegian] Excuse me? Two, uh... beers.
[in English] Nice place you got here.
I used to be in the bar business myself.
[in Norwegian] Well, if you want it, I'll give you a good price.
translation.zh: ‎你若想要 我优惠价转手

translation.en: I've had enough of the tax man and freezing temperatures.
translation.zh:
‎我受够了收税员和
‎冷死人的天气

translation.en: [in English] I'm moving to Alicante.
We should talk.
A hundred and fifty.
A hundred and fifty?
[in Norwegian] That's what it costs.
translation.zh:
‎-一百五十？
‎-就是那么多 ‎抱歉 我得走了 出了点事情

translation.en: [in English] Sorry, I have to go. Something just happened.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我得走了 出了点事情

translation.en: There's been a wolf on the farm.
- I'll take you. Yeah. - Are you sure?
Uh... Keep it.
- [in Norwegian] It was the wolf. - I know.
[in English] We're gonna get that wolf.
[in Norwegian] I promise.
[Sigrid] Come on, let's go inside.
You'd better turn away, you being a city boy.
translation.zh:
‎你最好转过身去
‎你是个城市人

translation.en: [in English] It's okay.
[Torgeir in Norwegian] The wolves are too bad. What good are they?
translation.zh: ‎狼太坏了 它们有什么好的？

translation.en: We've got trackers and shotguns over at our place if you need them.
translation.zh:
‎你若需要 我们这里有
‎追踪器和猎枪 ‎上次你们在追狼的时候
‎不是射死了市长的一只羊吗？

translation.en: Didn't you two shoot one of the mayor's goats last time you went after a wolf?
translation.zh:
‎上次你们在追狼的时候
‎不是射死了市长的一只羊吗？ ‎那是误射

translation.en: [both] That was an accidental shot.
- I've told you that before. - You bloody well know it was. [Frank in English] Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa.
translation.zh:
‎-我之前说过了
‎-你他妈的最好是误射

translation.en: Why are we sitting, talking when we should be out killing this fucking thing?
translation.zh:
‎我们不是该在外面杀狼吗？
‎干吗坐在这里聊天？

translation.en: [in Norwegian] In this country killing a wolf is worse than killing people.
translation.zh: ‎在这个国家 ‎杀狼比杀人还糟

translation.en: [in English] Bullshit. Are you kidding me?
What are we waiting for? I'm telling you right now--
translation.zh: ‎我们在等什么？ ‎我现在告诉你 我不要…

translation.en: - [knocking on door] - [Sigrid in Norwegian] Come in.
Good evening.
I heard about the wolf and just wanted to make sure everything was all right.
translation.zh:
‎我听到狼的消息
‎就是想确认是否一切都好

translation.en: There wouldn't be anyone thinking of doing anything rash here?
I think perhaps I'll look after this for a couple of days.
translation.zh: ‎这几天我或许该好好处理这事

translation.en: [in English] Excuse me, but aren't people allowed to defend  their own homes in this country?
translation.zh:
‎想问一下 这个国家的人
‎都不能捍卫自己的家园吗？

translation.en: Unlicensed killing of wild animals
is strictly forbidden in Norway.
[in Norwegian] I take it we're all fully aware of that.
Could I have a waffle? Of course, help yourself.
translation.zh:
‎-我能吃华夫饼吗？
‎-当然 自便！

translation.en: Thank you, Sigrid. You're welcome.
translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 西格丽德
‎-不客气

translation.en: Have a nice evening.
[in English] Sorry, Lily.
So, you guys really know how to find this wolf or what?
translation.zh: ‎你们真的知道怎么找到狼吗？

translation.en: [in Norwegian] What do you think you're gonna do to it?
Is he gonna back up over it in the lawn mower?
[in English] You guys in or out?
We're in, but...
Maybe it's a bit dark now.
- [in Norwegian] It's damn cold. - [in English] Yeah, real cold.
translation.zh:
‎-又冷得要死
‎-是啊 真的很冷

translation.en: Oh, I see.
What do you mean, "I see"?
You talk real big, but when it comes down to it, you're chicken.
translation.zh:
‎你们就会吹嘘
‎真要做的时候 就没种了

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Is he calling us "chicken"?
[Frank in English] Is this really necessary?
[in Norwegian] You can't be wandering about the woods in patent leather shoes.
[in English] Just look at the snow.
There's something wrong with these things!
[in Norwegian] Did I see some snowshoes in the barn?
[in Norwegian] The wolf appears to be further north.
Are you sure this is a good idea? You heard what the police chief said.
translation.zh:
‎你确定这主意可行？
‎你听到警长说的话了吧

translation.en: The police chief? She's home in bed by now.
translation.zh:
‎警长吗？她现在已经
‎回家睡觉了吧

translation.en: I'm just a bit worried about striking out off the track
with our new countryman back there.
Since when did you become such a pussy?
Come on.
Check out the tracker. Is he close by or what?
translation.zh:
‎看看追踪器！
‎是不是它靠近了还是怎样？

translation.en: [in Norwegian] You are getting better at it.
[in English] Yeah... Real funny.
[mutters] You fat fuck, you.
[in Norwegian] These are really fresh. Come on.
[Frank in English] Could have been in the Bahamas.
Or Fort Lauderdale.
No. I gotta go to a place where if your dick freezes off,
translation.zh:
‎不 我非得去一个
‎小鸡鸡要是被冻住

translation.en: you don't even notice it for three days.
I'm telling ya...
[Roar in Norwegian] What the hell!
Fuck!
Roar...
Sorry! I didn't see you!
I'm blacking out!
- Wait! - [groaning]
- Sorry, fuck! - You hit a main artery.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 妈的！ ‎你打到主动脉了

translation.en: - [gunshot in the distance] - What's happening?
Never mind that. I'm dying here, you fucking idiot.
translation.zh:
‎无所谓了 我要死在这了
‎你这他妈的蠢货

translation.en: Bandage me!
Torgeir, you shot me!
It just grazed you. You'll be fine.
- It really hurts. - It just grazed you. Here.
translation.zh:
‎-真的很痛
‎-只是擦伤 好了

translation.en: - You shot me, idiot! - Here.
- Do something! - Here.
We just have to stop the little that comes out.
translation.zh:
‎只要止住
‎流出来的一点点血就行

translation.en: [Frank in English] Did I hear a shot?
translation.zh:
‎只要止住
‎流出来的一点点血就行 ‎我听到枪声了？ ‎误射 但没事了

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Misfire. But it's all right.
[in English] Look what I ran into while you kids were playing cowboys and Indians.
translation.zh:
‎你俩在玩牛仔与印第安人时
‎看看我遇到了什么

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Holy shit!
[in English] How about that?
[Torgeir in Norwegian] Fuck!
[in English] One more rock should do it, huh?
translation.zh: ‎再多一块石头应该就可以了

translation.en: [whispering in Norwegian] Shh! What was that?
[whispering] Probably just a deer or something.
[man in Norwegian] Hello? Anybody there?
[Frank in English] We gotta get out of these woods.
[in Norwegian] I can't walk home on this leg.
[Torgeir in English] I used to go fishing with NAV here.
translation.zh: ‎我和劳福社的人来过这里钓鱼

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Johansen's cabin.
I think it's in that area. We can spend the night there.
translation.zh:
‎估计是在这一带
‎我们可以在那里过夜

translation.en: [man] What are you doing?
- [Torgeir] Where the hell is the key? - [shuddering]
Fuck.
[in English] I found it.
[Torgeir in Norwegian] I know what we need now.
- Do you have it? - Yes.
- [in English] That's a good idea. - Yeah.
[chuckles] There's booze in that. Yes, homemade.
That's some Norwegian cuisine I could learn to love.
translation.zh:
‎这种挪威烹饪
‎我倒是可以试着喜欢上

translation.en: [in Norwegian] I'm hungry.
[in English] You should call room service.
What did you do, um... back in the States?
I had a restaurant, a little bar.
[in Norwegian] You seem to know a lot about guns and...
translation.zh:
‎对于一个经营餐馆的人来说
‎你似乎知道太多有关枪支的事

translation.en: [in English] getting rid of evidence...
translation.zh:
‎对于一个经营餐馆的人来说
‎你似乎知道太多有关枪支的事 ‎还有如何除掉证据

translation.en: [in Norwegian] and pistols for just a restaurant guy.
[in English] You kiddin'?
You ever seen the Cooking Channel?
It can get pretty rough.
[in Norwegian] What the hell? What the hell?
Any naked ladies?
Yeah.
- [Roar laughs] - Johansen?
- Yeah. - [Roar in Norwegian] Look at him.
[Torgeir] Holy shit! Look at this.
She can't be more than 15, 16 years old.
I've driven her and her mom to school several times.
translation.zh: ‎我载过几次她和她妈去学校

translation.en: [Torgeir] He works for the county.
[in English] Yeah, that's interesting.
- [in Norwegian] I am getting sick. - [Torgeir] Look at him!
translation.zh:
‎-我都要恶心死了
‎-看看他！ ‎太震惊了！

translation.en: I am shocked!
This is serious business.
He works for the county.
Roar...
[in English] Look who's here.
Be cool, okay? Follow my lead.
Oh, hello.
[Laila in English] Hi.
[in Norwegian] Well, been on a long trip?
[in English] Just, uh, out enjoying your lovely scenery.
translation.zh: ‎就是出来欣赏一下美丽的风景

translation.en: [in Norwegian] We've had a report about illegal hunting in this area.
translation.zh:
‎我们接到报告说
‎这一带有人非法捕猎

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Wow!
- [in English] Illegal hunting, yeah? - Ah.
That's crazy.
[in Norwegian] We have a witness.
Supervisor Antonsen.
He saw illegal hunting in the Mesna hills yesterday.
translation.zh:
‎他昨天在梅思娜山区
‎看到非法捕猎

translation.en: If you have something to say, it would be wise to do it now.
translation.zh:
‎你若有什么要招的
‎现在就放聪明点

translation.en: [in Norwegian] We were...
[in English] We don't really have anything to say because we didn't see anything.
translation.zh:
‎我们真没什么可说的
‎因为我们什么都没看到

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Did you see these guys yesterday?
No.
- Huh? - No?
The ones I saw were younger fellas.
[Laila] But you said you saw the Lien brothers.
[Antonsen] My eyesight clearly isn't as good as it used to be.
[Lailla] Isn't it, now?
The ones I saw must have been some youths from Oslo.
translation.zh:
‎我看到的肯定是
‎从奥斯陆来的年轻人

translation.en: Youths from Oslo are the worst.
[in English] So, now that we've cleared up that little misunderstanding,
why don't we all go inside and have a drink?
[in Norwegian] Thank you, but we'd better be off.
[in English] Always good to help the authorities.
Especially when they're neighbors. [chuckles]
How ya doin'?
[in Norwegian] I don't think we have an appointment today.
[in English] I think we do.
[in Norwegian] If you think you can come charging in here with more bribes...
translation.zh:
‎你若以为来这里行行贿
‎就能颐指气使…

translation.en: [in English] Yeah, well, that's my appointment.
[in Norwegian] What's this?
But how have you got hold of these?
[in English] The real question is, what am I gonna do with them?
translation.zh:
‎真正的问题是
‎我要拿这些照片怎么办？

translation.en: Is this blackmail?
Definitely.
Where I come from, these kind of pictures could be a problem for a public official,
translation.zh:
‎在我的地方 ‎这些照片对公务人员来说
‎是个大问题

translation.en: but maybe that's just [mocking] cultural differences.
translation.zh:
‎这些照片对公务人员来说
‎是个大问题 ‎但这或许只是文化上的差异

translation.en: Could be a problem here as well. Absolutely.
translation.zh: ‎在这里也是大问题 毫无疑问

translation.en: Okay.
How about I make the pictures disappear and you do a little something for me.
translation.zh: ‎要么 我让这些照片消失 ‎但你要帮我点小忙如何？

translation.en: Is this about the... [in Norwegian] New Start course? [in English] I can get you off, it's no problem.
translation.zh:
‎是关于“新生课程”吗？
‎我可以免去你的 没问题

translation.en: [in English] Nah.
I'm gonna take that course and this is gonna be my teacher.
translation.zh:
‎我想上那个课程
‎但她要当我的老师

translation.en: [in Norwegian] She has been here for some interviews...
[in English] She's not working here, you know.
Is that gonna be a problem?
No, no, no, no, no.
All right.
So now all we gotta do is take care of the license for my sports bar.
translation.zh:
‎现在我们需要做的就是
‎帮我弄好我的运动酒吧执照

translation.en: Yeah, you know, as I said, that's a very complicated...
translation.zh:
‎是啊 你知道 就像我说的
‎这事非常复杂…

translation.en: I understand.
Wait, wait, wait, I can... I can call a guy.
translation.zh:
‎等等 我可以…
‎我可以打给电话找人

translation.en: [in Norwegian] I think maybe I have a friend in the Department of Industry...
translation.zh:
‎我好像有个朋友
‎在这个行业的部门工作…

translation.en: [in English] Listen, last time, you mentioned something about financial motivation...
translation.zh:
‎听着 上次你提到
‎关于财务动因的事…

translation.en: Yeah, I did.
But now, this is all the motivation we need, pally.
translation.zh:
‎但现在 这就是
‎我们需要的动因 兄弟

translation.en: Make that fucking phone call.
Yep.
[Frank] What do you think of this joint?
Looks nice.
Good enough to own?
Of course it's good enough to own. [chuckles]
What do you think?
Well, I bought it.
I need a partner. I'm thinking about you.
translation.zh: ‎我需要搭档 就想到你了

translation.en: Me?
You bought it?
[chuckles] Yep.
Take a look.
[in Norwegian] But how much is this gonna cost me?
Nothing.
You sign at the bottom, then you're a bar owner.
translation.zh:
‎你在这底下签字
‎你就是酒吧主人

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Are you kidding?
[in English] You're not shitting me right now?
[in Norwegian] You're the fuckin' classiest immigrant I've met.
translation.zh: ‎你真是我见过最牛逼的移民者

translation.en: [in English] I'll take that as a yes?
You bet your ass it's a yes.
Torgeir Lien.
I'm a bar owner now!
- Congratulations. - Thank you, sir!
translation.zh:
‎-恭喜
‎-谢谢你 先生！ ‎我们帮自己倒点酒
‎庆祝庆祝吧？

translation.en: Why don't you pour us a little celebration libation?
translation.zh:
‎我们帮自己倒点酒
‎庆祝庆祝吧？

translation.en: Sure, Giovanni.
Look at me, I'm a bar owner!
[in Norwegian] This could be a new start for me, Giovanni.
translation.zh:
‎乔凡尼 这是我的
‎一个全新开始 ‎叫我强尼

translation.en: [in English] Call me Johnny.
translation.zh: ‎叫我强尼 ‎好 我叫你强尼

translation.en: Okay, I'll call you Johnny.
To new beginnings. New beginnings.
- And early fucking spring. - Yeah.
- [in Norwegian] Cheers. - Cheers.
[Torgeir in English] "To my number one fan, Frank."
translation.zh: ‎“为我的头号粉丝 弗兰克”

translation.en: [in Norwegian] Who's Frank then?
[in English] Somebody I used to know.
In another life.
[in Norwegian] This is Laila Hovland, chief of police in Lillehammer.
translation.zh:
‎我是莉莉哈默的警长
‎莱拉霍夫兰

translation.en: I'd like to run a background check on Giovanni Henriksen.
translation.zh:
‎我想要查查
‎乔瓦尼亨里克森的背景

translation.en: Giovanni. Yeah.
